greenmirror.server

Class VisualizerMemento

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenmirror.server.VisualizerMemento

  • public class VisualizerMemento
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to store a system state of the visualizer. This class fulfils the memento role of the memento design pattern and contains the originator and caretaker interfaces that should be implemented by classes that accept those roles. More information on the pattern is found here.
    Author:
    Karim El Assal

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  VisualizerMemento.Caretaker
      The caretaker role from the memento design pattern.
      static interface  VisualizerMemento.Originator
      The originator role of the memento design pattern.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VisualizerMemento

        public VisualizerMemento(NodeList nodes,
                         javafx.animation.SequentialTransition transition)
        Creates a new memento instance. The storage of the node data is not supported in this version of GreenMirror.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the node data to store in the memento
        transition - the data to transition to the next state, which will also be stored in the memento

    • Method Detail

      • getNodes

        public @NonNull java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getNodes()
        Returns the states of the nodes. They are set by node id. Their FX state is also stored.
        Returns:
        the states of the nodes

      • getTransition

        public javafx.animation.SequentialTransition getTransition()
        Returns:
        the transition needed to go to the next state
